notes.text: sap.m.RadioButton: Fixed Safari rendering issue with zoom behavior
sap.m.IconTabBar: Unnecessary bold on tab text is now removed
sap.m.Popover: Calculate correct placement on resize
sap.m.Menu: fixed endContent controls `press` event firing
We've now applied 4px padding between the title and the image of the slide tile when height is less than 180px
sap.m.QuickViewPage: Remove synchronous request during initalization
Table: Add ODataV4-specific plugins for selection and tree support
sap.m.DynamicDateRange: options list accessibility semantics adjusted
